item.description:
Spotlight on Broadway is being performed by ACT Andover at the new Tewksbury Sr Center .

A toe tapping review of the history of the best of Broadwaytold through song, dance and narration?. Groups of 10 or more tickets are $15 ea. Rhonda will reserve 10 tickets at the group price. It is general seating but she can reserve a group of seats so everyone will be seated together. Maybe more if people show an interest. Please, no "maybe" replies. Purchase your ticket and then reply yes. If enough folks are interested we can find a place for dinner first and drinks, maybe dancing after. Let me know what you think?.

Tix for the group pricing can be ordered by calling the ticketline 978-289-4123
and mention "Merrimack Friends" for the group rate.You can also email for tickets to Tickets@ActAndover.com and mention "Merrimack Friends" for the group rate

Thanks Rhonda for helping to make this event possible for our members.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in front of the ticket window at 6:45. Show starts at 7.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Spotlight on Broadway
